title: Near Dark
creator_credit: De Laurentiis Entertainment Group (DEG), F/M, Near Dark Joint Venture, Eric Red, Kathryn Bigelow, Stephen Altman, Joseph A. Porro and Steven-Charles Jaffe
brief_description: A mid-western farm boy reluctantly becomes a member of the undead when a girl he meets turns out to be part of a band of southern vampires who roam the highways in stolen cars.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.
